hero.title: I'm Julian Suringa, a front-end web developer.
desc: Experience in front-end and back-end development technologies including advanced HTML/XHTML, CSS, SCSS, CSS Module, CSS-in-JS (styled component), JavaScript (cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility like AJAX, jQuery, React, Redux, Redux Saga, and Angular), typescript, and Node.js. And for databases, there are MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MongoDB.
